hadiths.text: It was narrated from Khuzaimah bin Thabit:That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: “Allah is not too shy to tell the truth,” three times. “Do not have intercourse with women in their buttocks.”

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ إِتْيَانِ النِّسَاءِ، فِي أَدْبَارِهِنَّ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of having intercourse with women in the buttocks
